Text: Works fine, Not sure why there is a serial included, i haven't been asked for one. I'm in two minds about inertial scrolling, it seems to be less accurate than the normal two finger scrolling. Pretty cool upload tho. Thanks alot!

You are just using the trial for now then. And you'll get notices like every 800 times you use it (which is more often than you realize). When you get it use the serial and enjoy. I didn't like it but I tried it for a few days, and when I went back I almost went insane! haha
